code: import{actionTypes}from"./actionTypes";export var actionCategoryNav=function actionCategoryNav(category){return{type:actionTypes.CATEGORY_NAV,payload:category};};export var actionViewItemDetails=function actionViewItemDetails(itemId,name,price,image){return{type:actionTypes.ITEM_DETAILS,itemId:itemId,itemName:name,itemPrice:price,itemImage:image};};export var actionClearItemDetails=function actionClearItemDetails(){return{type:actionTypes.ITEM_DETAILS_CLEAR};};export var actionAddAnimationToTitle=function actionAddAnimationToTitle(){return{type:actionTypes.ADD_ANIMATION_TO_TITLE};};
